Thanks to you for responding so quickly.

This is indeed a bug. I need more time to investigate it, now I give you a work 
around way to bypass it temporarily.

Jar your database, and connect this jar file. An example is,
Folder name: c:/dbexample
Jar name: c:/dbexample.jar (it includes dbexample folder)
Connection url is: jdbc:derby:jar:(c:/dbexample.jar)dbexample

Thanks,
*** Bug 105787 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

It seems this bug can not be solved without the change of BIRT framework in 
designing and viewing. 

Derby driver can not be loaded into the same JVM by two different ClassLoader, 
but current framework needs to use it. Refer to bug105787.
This bug is resolved after viewer does not use another class loader to load all plugins.
